title: The weeping earth: salt in South Eastern Australia
brief_description: Dr Jim Bowler introduces a program addressing the scourge of the Australian land - salt - a side effect of settlement and clearing. Discusses the situation before European settlement and examines why salt is such a problem by looking at the history of the Australian landscape.
